dcterms:description: A dataset containing trajectories sampled at 25 Hz extracted from multi-perspective video feeds of football matches, specifically from the German Bundesliga season 2014/15. The dataset consists of scenes of 5 seconds fixed length with 50% overlap, yielding 1,005 samples for one game.
dcterms:title: German Bundesliga Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset collected from participants' annotations during a user study, aimed at learning user-specific similarity functions for football trajectories.
dcterms:title: Test Dataset (User-Specific Annotations)

dcterms:creator: Christoﬀer Löﬄer
Luca Reeb
Daniel Dzibela
Robert Marzilger
Nicolas Witt
Björn M. Eskoﬁer
Christopher Mutschler
dcterms:description: A dataset used for training a deep convolutional network to learn a distance function from human annotations in the context of football trajectory data.
dcterms:title: Football Trajectory Dataset
